content:
I've created naming systems and found out two issues:

  • I have a contact name and telecom but in the generated narrative the contact is still empty.
  • My contact is overwritten by the IG. it replaces it with the infos from the contact (me) in the ImplementationGuide file
the second is how you set up the IG to work
the first... I'm not sure... can I rpreoduce?
You can found a naming system and the pages here: https://github.com/ec-ehealth/Sushi-examples.
